articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Uiju, October 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Choe Chun Nyo, a centenarian woman residing in Uiju County, North Phyongan Province.
					 It was not until President Kim Il Sung liberated the country that Choe could lead a worthy life. She lived in grief as a member of a stateless nation after her birth, subject to maltreatment and contempt.
					
					 She worked hard as an agricultural worker to live up to the loving care shown by the country even a bit. She kept herself busy even after becoming a pensioner.
					
					 She likes edible herbs and vegetables, having a balanced diet. She keeps herself optimistic, doing needlework and cultivating kitchen garden.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Censures U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Joint Military Drill
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Censures U.S.-Japan-S. Korea Joint Military Drill
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Saturday as regards another joint military drill launched by the U.S. in league with Japan and the south Korean puppet forces against the DPRK:
					 The U.S., Japan and south Korean puppet forces Saturday started a provocative joint naval drill chiefly targeting the DPRK with Aegis destroyer and many warships and forces involved.
					
					 The saber-rattling is another grave military provocation against the DPRK and a revelation of the wild ambition to secure hegemony by wrecking peace and security in the region.
					
					 Not content with staging the largest-ever joint naval drill with south Korea by mobilizing the huge strategic assets including the nuclear aircraft carrier Ronald Reagan recently, the U.S. let Japan join in the above-said naval maneuver to put military pressure upon the DPRK.  This shows that the U.S. is to chiefly blame for the escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The on-going joint military drill on the Korean peninsula that followed the missile warning exercise held in June last goes to clearly prove that the U.S.-Japan-south Korea triangular military alliance is no longer a "ghost-like" one but is taking into shape as core part of the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 In actuality, the U.S. is openly claiming that the U.S.-Japan-south Korea cooperation is being expanded according to the second-stage goal of its Asia-Pacific rebalancing strategy.
					
					 The reality shows again that the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK were so just when they adopted the line and policies on bolstering up the nuclear deterrence for self-defence in quality and quantity.
					
					 The DPRK will resolutely frustrate all challenges of the U.S. and its vassal forces to reliably defend peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region by taking hold on the treasured nuclear sword for independence and justice.

articles.title: Vice-Chairmen of C.C., WPK Visit Living Quarters of Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK
articles.content:
Vice-Chairmen of C.C., WPK Visit Living Quarters of Participants in Seventh Congress of GFTUK
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Vice-chairmen of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) visited the living quarters of the participants in the 7th Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) on Saturday.
					 Kim Ki Nam and Choe Thae Bok, officials concerned and senior officials of the C.C., the GFTUK met with the participants and congratulated officials and members of the trade unions and workers on participating in the congress.
					
					 Upon hearing the story that the participants have brought about a great leaping forward and innovations in the work sites for a great socialist upswing on the self-development first principle, upholding the Party's ideology and cause, they appreciated their successes.
					
					 They called upon the participants to glorify forever the immortal revolutionary feats President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in developing the GFTUK and thoroughly implement the tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea and thus become honorable victors in the sacred drive to add shine to the great era of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Delegation of Social Scientists Society of Korea Leaves to Visit African Countries
articles.content:
Delegation of Social Scientists Society of Korea Leaves to Visit African Countries
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea headed by Vice-Chairman Ri Kil Song left here on Saturday to visit African countries.

articles.title: DPRK Team Wins 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Team Wins 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team won the 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup held in Jordan.
					 There took place the finals between the DPRK team and its Japanese rival on Oct. 22.
					
					 The DPRK team beat its Japanese rival 5:4 in the eleven meter penalty kick at the end of the draw in the first and second halves of the match.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The participants of the Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues with strong yearning and boundless reverence for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, founders, builders and outstanding leaders of the federation, and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Progress Made in Production of Teaching Tools for Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Progress Made in Production of Teaching Tools for Disaster Areas
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A progress has been made in the production of teaching aids and furnishings for schools and kindergartens in the flood-hit areas of the DPRK.
					 The Pyongyang Timber Mill carried out its assignment of producing hundreds of school desks in a short span of time while speeding up the production of desks to be arranged at laboratories.
					
					 The Kilju Plywood Factory, too, is making a rapid progress in the production of teaching aids and furnishings.

articles.title: Red-Flag Units of DPRK Take Lead in Assisting Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Red-Flag Units of DPRK Take Lead in Assisting Disaster Areas
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Many units honored with the title of the Three-Revolution Red Flag in the DPRK have taken the lead in an increased production drive to assist the flood-hit northern part of the country.
					 The February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine carried out its production assignment at 100.3 percent in last 100 days and sent a large amount of food, thousands of pieces of daily necessaries and other aid materials to the disaster areas.
					
					 Songrim Port made a progress in shipping and unloading of magnetite concentrate and anthracite needed for the flood damage rehabilitation by introducing various technical inventions.
					
					 The Myongchon Garment Factory fulfilled its plan for the 200-day campaign at 116.7 percent in September and offered a great deal of food and more than one hundred sets of padded clothes to the flood-stricken areas.
					
					 The Sinuiju Cosmetics Factory turned out 15 000 soaps in addition for the disaster areas.

articles.title: Anniversary of Jangjasan Revolutionary Museum Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Jangjasan Revolutionary Museum Marked
Kanggye, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Jangjasan Revolutionary Museum marked its 40th founding anniversary.
					 The museum situated in Kanggye City, Jagang Province tells about immortal footsteps left by leader Kim Jong Il during the Fatherland Liberation War. It is a significant historical site associated with the long journey of revolution the great men of the Mangyongdae family made for three generations for the country and its people.
					
					 Over the past four decades since its founding on Oct. 22, Juche 65 (1976), the museum has performed its role as a historic witness conveying long the revolutionary intention and immortal footsteps of the great leaders and made achievements in thoroughly preparing the Korean people and school youth and children as successors to the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 A meeting marking the anniversary took place on Saturday.

articles.title: Land Management in South Hamgyong Province of DPRK
articles.content:
Land Management in South Hamgyong Province of DPRK
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK is taking the lead in the ongoing nation-wide autumn campaign for land management.
					 According to Kim Sam Yong, director of the Provincial Land and Environmental Conservation Bureau, the province started the campaign with a project to expand the width of roads for the construction of the Tanchon Power Station, which is of national significance.
					
					 It carried out the filling of earth of 100 000 cubic meters and the removal of 440 000 cubic meters of bedrocks in 40km-long road section. And a progress was made at the tunneling construction in Machon Pass to make ventilating shaft of hundreds of meters.
					
					 Meanwhile, the laying of a new road goes on at the final stage in Tanchon area.
					
					 Tanchon City built new nurseries while pushing ahead with the construction of 10-odd bridges and the repair of embankments.
					
					 Similar successes are witnessed in Pukchong, Jongphyong and Yodok counties.
					
					 At present, more than 10 projects are simultaneously making headway in the province. They include the reconstruction of the Provincial People's Hospital, the second-stage reconstruction of Majon Resort and the construction of 300 flats for scientists and a provincial sci-tech library.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Park Geun Hye's Talk about "North's Provocation" Prelude to War against North
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Park Geun Hye's Talk about "North's Provocation" Prelude to War against North
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group in the grip of a serious ruling crisis is busy trumpeting about "the north's provocation" everywhere, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The sinister aim sought by the Park group in kicking up confrontation hysteria, vociferating about "the north's provocation", has already been brought to light, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces' louder talk about "provocation by the north" only means the increasing danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Their loud-mouthed "provocation by the north," therefore, means a prelude to a war against the north.
					
					 The south Korean military gangsters are desperately resorting to military provocations to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the north under the pretext of coping with the "provocation by the north."
					
					 Whenever an opportunity presents itself, the south Korean warmongers trumpet about "provocation by the north" in a bid to mislead the public opinion. It is their cynical ploy to make the world believe any war provocation perpetrated by them was done by the north. 
					
					 Another aim sought by the Park group through the above-said propaganda is to hype the "security crisis" in an effort to weather their worst ruling crisis.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group are now becoming ever more talkative about "north's provocation," raising a hue and cry over "threat of the north's nukes" and "contingency," in a crafty bid to divert elsewhere the attention of the angry public and prolong their remaining days.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can prolong their remaining days by using the fiction about "provocation by the north" as a lever for tiding over their ruling crisis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Snubbing S. Korean People's No-THAAD Petition
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Snubbing S. Korean People's No-THAAD Petition
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Recently, the White House released a "message" in reply to the petition signed by more than 100 000 netizens reflecting the No-THAAD sentiments of Koreans in the south and abroad.
					 In the "message" the U.S. blustered that it would make sure that THAAD would be deployed at the earliest date, touting "counteraction against nuclear and missile threat" from someone and the "will to defend" south Korea.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 The above-said message once again revealed the brigandish design of the U.S. to make south Korea fall victim to its hegemonic strategy and its permanent colony by deploying THAAD at any cost.
					
					 The deployment of THAAD in south Korea is a risky provocation wrecking peace and stability and escalating the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of Northeast Asia. It is, at the same time, another source of an arms race among nuclear powers and a new Cold War.
					
					 What lashes the Koreans into fury is the behavior of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors. They are getting desperate in the treacherous moves for the deployment of THAAD, keeping the north-south ties in the worst catastrophe and inflicting untold pain upon south Koreans through the frantic confrontation with the compatriots in the north while remaining utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation.
					
					 Keen on sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the compatriots in the north, traitor Park is working with bloodshot eyes to get THAAD deployed in south Korea in order to realize her wild ambition to invade the north in collusion with her U.S. master by pleasing him even at the sacrifice of all south Koreans.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet regime's deployment of THAAD would only trigger off strong resistance of the south Korean people, give momentum to the DPRK's further bolstering of nuclear deterrent for self-defence and thus precipitate their final doom.

articles.title: KCNA Ridicules Park Geun Hye Group's Solicitation for Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Ridicules Park Geun Hye Group's Solicitation for Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea in the grip of extreme crisis is going ever more foolish.
					 The puppet ministers and vice-ministers of Foreign Affairs, Unification and Defense, the prime minister and other high-ranking officials and those concerned of Chongwadae vied each other to meet the U.S. ambassador to the UN, former U.S. parliamentary undersecretary of State and the U.S. former undersecretary of Defense to solicit cooperation in their moves to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 They complained that regretfully sanctions failed to lead the north to changes and implored for close cooperation in the efforts to seek the earliest adoption of the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions."
					
					 Their behavior of praising such guy as the U.S. ambassador as "special diplomatic envoy" clearly proves once again that the Park Geun Hye regime is the group of sycophants and traitors without having even an iota of national self-respect and psychopaths keen to stifle compatriots.
					
					 The Park regime is more dead than alive as it is forsaken by the people at home and abroad.
					
					 The movement for impeaching traitor Park is mounting and her rule is shaking to its very foundation after the ceaseless disclosure of scandals amid the political mayhem caused by her fascist dictatorship, unpopular rule, hideous confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and war moves since her seizure of power.
					
					 The hectic diplomacy conducted by her at the UN and in other international arenas for soliciting harsher sanctions and pressure on the DPRK proved futile, pushing her group to tighter corner.
					
					 The fair international public is snubbing the puppet forces, voicing support and sympathy with the DPRK in its self-defensive measures for firmly protecting the dignity and security of the nation from the growing nuclear threat of the U.S.
					
					 The group of traitors are clinging to the coattails of their American master in a bid to find their way of escaping their ruin at any cost, forsaken by the domestic and foreign public, but this would only bring them bitterer disgrace.
					
					 They are idiots without equals in the world as they are asking the outsiders for stifling the compatriots, still failing to face up to the trend of the times.
					
					 They are piteous enough to regard the riff-raffs of the Obama group as savior like a drowning man catching at a straw. Obama will be soon ousted from the White House after earning the ill-fame as "completely failed administration."
					
					 It is out of question that the American master would care for his stooges whose fate is hanging by a thread as he is panic-stricken, upset by the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrence for self-defense in succession.
					
					 Inevitable is the doom of the colonial stooges forsaken by the nation.
					
					 They had better go to their graves by themselves, not seeking their way out in the above-said acts of treachery.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lashes out at U.S. Official's Malignant Mud-slinging at DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lashes out at U.S. Official's Malignant Mud-slinging at DPRK
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Symptoms of doom of the Obama group are manifested in the political unrest of the officials of the U.S. administration who are in the grip of self-contradiction.
					 On Oct. 12 Rassel, U.S. assistant secretary of State for East Asia-Pacific Affairs, dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, talking nonsense that it would meet its end the moment it has access to the capabilities for making a nuclear strike.
					
					 What he raved is no more than the last-ditch efforts to evade the responsibility for having shaken the foundation of the security of the mainland as the Obama group's north Korea policy suffered a total failure and they compelled the DPRK to emerge the strongest nuclear weapons state though they have to quit the White House soon.
					
					 It is normal for politicians with elementary political sense to notice the qualitative change taking place in the politico-military structure in the present world.
					
					 However, Rassel is so ignorant of the DPRK though he claims has been in charge of the north Korea policy for the past more than two decades. It is pity that Americans have national security left to such guy to look after it.
					
					 After choosing East Asia-Pacific region as the main theater for holding supremacy in the 21st century the Obama administration let him take charge of the region and speak for it. 
					
					 When referring to the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts in the past, Rassel malignantly decried it, blustering that "north Korea would never achieve prosperity as long as it pushes forward its nuclear development."
					
					 While talking about "nuclear and missile threat" from the  DPRK, he talked volumes about the issue of military cooperation among the U.S., Japan and south Korea with Washington as a main player, the building of information network and investment in deploying THAAD. Moreover, he never opened his mouth without letting out a slew of rubbish about "human rights situation in the north," regardless of time and place.
					
					 What Rassel uttered this time is nothing but a scream made by the guy, much upset by the total failure of the north Korea policy of the present U.S. administration which has refused to understand the generally accepted principle of the sovereignty of other countries and the essence of the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. that compelled the DPRK to have access to nukes.
					
					 The U.S. has staged nuclear war drills against the DPRK, non-nuclear weapon state, every year after designating it as the target of preemptive nuclear attack, thus posing grave threat to its supreme interests and pushing it to having access to nukes.
					
					 The DPRK has bolstered up its nuclear force both in quality and quantity as it has been exposed to constant and direct nuclear threat from the U.S., the world's biggest nuclear weapons state and nuclear war criminal state. It was, therefore, the best option to protect the sovereignty and vital rights of the Korean nation.
					
					 Tragedy is that the U.S., still seized with megalomania, is insisting on its contradictory view of the situation and failing to realize that the DPRK is not the country which it can control as it pleases.
					
					 The DPRK regards the mud-slinging at the dignity of its supreme leadership as the most blatant challenge to it and the worst hostile act of putting into practice the declaration of a war that the U.S. made before the former.
					
					 Rassel's flurry of invective is sheer rhetoric.
					
					 The White House will disappear the moment the U.S. launches aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The American land has come within the range of powerful nuclear strike means of Juche Korea. They are just waiting for the order to fire, precisely aiming at the cesspool of evils and bases of aggression. 
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK including the highly sophisticated nuclear force whose basic mission is to devotedly protect the supreme leadership will never miss their target in any case.
					
					 The U.S. will be forced to pay dearly for malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and Obama will realize what the high price is like before he leaves the White House.
					
					 Those beating air are bound to perish in the flames kindled by themselves.

articles.title: U.S., Japanese and S. Korean Warmongers Plan Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
U.S., Japanese and S. Korean Warmongers Plan Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Naval forces of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, Japan and south Korea are mulling staging joint military drills aiming at sea blockade against the DPRK in the open sea east of Jeju Island on Oct. 22 and 23, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 To be involved in them are Aegis destroyers, logistic support ships, helicopters, sea-patrol planes and other huge aggression forces of the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 It was reported that they include sea check, search and rescue and other operations.

articles.title: Total Halt to U.S. Bio-Chemical War Scenario Demanded
articles.content:
Total Halt to U.S. Bio-Chemical War Scenario Demanded
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Pusan City Committee of the Minju Party of south Korea in a statement on Oct. 19 denounced the U.S. for its bio-chemical weapons experiment, according to the south Korean News 1. 
					 The statement noted that the subcontract business specializing in bio-chemical war of the U.S. Defense Department was designated as a contractor of "Jupiter plan", U.S. bio-chemical war scenario, whose intensive research is now under way at the facilities of the U.S. forces in Pusan.
					
					 The chairman of the Pusan City Committee of the above-said party called for a total stop to the U.S. bio-chemical war scenario posing a threat to the life and security of the citizens of Pusan, underscoring the need to strongly counter the said experiment in the future.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Person Calls for Overthrowing Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Person Calls for Overthrowing Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A media person of south Korea posted on a website an article titled "Let us overthrow Park Geun Hye" on Oct. 15.
					 The blacklist worked out under the Park regime in which power-backed scandals are being disclosed one after another is a problem which cannot be overlooked, the article said.
					
					 It accused the chief executive of excluding the artistes from the list of recipients of public aid under the pretext that they are not supporting her and made assertions contrary to the purpose of the regime.
					
					 The blacklist is an illegal act of trampling down the freedom of expression and creation, it held.
					
					 The article called upon all people to take actions to force Park Geun Hye to step down as she denies truth that all power comes from the people.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Remarks Flailed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Anti-DPRK Remarks Flailed
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea has gone mad over confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the DPRK.
					 She spouted invectives against the DPRK at a "ceremony marking the day of ROK army" and a "state council meeting" some days ago, asserting that "defectors" from the north would flow into south Korea en masse.
					
					 In this regard, Ri Min Hyok, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 As been well-known to the world, south Korea is a veritable hell where the dignity and vital right of human being are trampled down and people's elementary democratic freedom and rights are crudely violated.
					
					 Nevertheless, Park is agitating "defection" to south Korea, crazy with confrontation and hostility towards the DPRK and hanging her hope on the U.S.'s "preemptive strike".
					
					 She should be mindful that such action will only accelerate her death.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army has already kept Chongwadae, the den of vices, within the striking range and will wipe out the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to the last one if it shows any evil omen.

articles.title: 100-day Candlelight Rally against THAAD Deployment Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
100-day Candlelight Rally against THAAD Deployment Held in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- A 100-day candlelight rally took place in Songju, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea on Oct. 20 in protest against the U.S. and the puppet forces' forcible deployment of THAAD, according to a report.
					 Attending it were more than 900 citizens from Songju, Kimchon and Taegu.
					
					 The speakers said that the Park Geun Hye regime is no longer "government" as it poses threat to the people's life.
					
					 They would fight with candles even 200 or 300 days till the plan for THAAD deployment is retracted, they declared.

articles.title: KCTU Stages Large-scale Anti-"Government" Struggle
articles.content:
KCTU Stages Large-scale Anti-"Government" Struggle
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) waged a large-scale anti-"government" struggle in Seoul on Oct. 19 for winning a victory in the general strike.
					 The speakers accused the authorities and plutocrats of suppressing trade unions by introducing the system of paying salaries according to piece rate without consent from the unions, changing employment regulations and distorting legitimate strike as illegal.
					
					 The railway trade union expressed the will to stage indefinite general strike.
					
					 At a large-scale rally of the KCTU the speakers called for leading the present general strike to people's all-out strike and fighting to force the corrupt, illegal and man-killing regime to step down.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Rosiski Pisateli Publishing House of Russia published in booklet leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" with due ceremony on October 14 on the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 The work, published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990), deals with the idea that the leadership of the party is the decisive guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and clarifies the matter of developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the Juche-type revolutionary party and the basic way of performing the mission and duty of the party as a leadership political body.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary to Be Remembered in Switzerland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary to Be Remembered in Switzerland
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Swiss remembrance committee for the fifth anniversary of demise of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Basel on October 16.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from October 23 to December 18 and decided to widely introduce the works and exploits of Kim Jong Il and organize significant events such as a remembrance meeting, seminar on his exploits and film show.

articles.title: Ecuadorian Body Hails Appeal of Int'l Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Ecuadorian Body Hails Appeal of Int'l Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- The Ecuadorian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu on October 15 made public a statement hailing the appeal of the international preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu.
					 The statement said the appeal is reflective of aspiration of the world progressives to significantly celebrate auspicious holidays in 2017 with the Korean people.
					
					 It is our due duty to highly praise the undying exploits the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed for the prosperity of Korea and the cause of global independence, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Now the progressives ardently revere and follow the respected H.E. Marshal Kim Jong Un who is developing the DPRK into the invincible socialist power no one dares provoke and independent and powerful bulwark against imperialism with his outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 We will rev up the atmosphere with colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the significant holidays of the DPRK next year and actively take part in the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu to be held in August.
					
					 We extend invariable support and solidarity to the drive of the Korean people for building a socialist power and reunifying the country by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Praised by Russian Newspapers
Pyongyang, October 22 (KCNA) -- Russian papers dedicated articles, illustrated with photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, to the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 90th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU). Articles were carried between September 30 and October 11.
					 Byvor in an article titled "Great party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" referred to the party-building exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, adding it is the unanimous will and unshakable faith of all members of the WPK to glorify it as the one of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages.
					
					 Rio Panorama in an article titled "Brilliant course" gave a detailed account of the fact that thanks to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu the WPK has led the service personnel and people of the DPRK to victory and glory for the past seven decades.
					
					 Vladivostok in an article titled "Eternal path" referred to the historic significance of the formation of the DIU on October 17, 1926.
					
					 In an article titled "Party that achieved harmonious whole with popular masses" said the strongest single-minded unity between the WPK and the popular masses that no party in the world can imitate and which can not be broken even by nukes is admired by the world public.
					
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda and Zebri Deve, online newspaper of Khabarovsk Territory, praised Kim Jong Un for developing the WPK into steel-strong vanguard ranks advancing by dint of ideology and unity and for having the noble outlook on the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Choe Chun Nyo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia alimentos de cumpleanos a Choe Chun Nyo
Uiju, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio alimentos de cumpleanos a la longeva centenaria Choe Chun Nyo que vive en el distrito de Uiju de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte.
					Ella vivia maltratada y despreciada durante el colonialismo japones sobre Corea, pero comenzo a vivir felizmente desde cuando el Presidente Kim Il Sung liberara la patria en 1945.
					
					Trabajo con abnegacion como campesina para reciprocar las benevolencias del pais y no dejo de laborar aun despues de ser jubilada.
					
					Mantiene la dieta equilibrada y prefiere las plantas comestibles del monte y vegetales.
					
					Vive siempre con optimismo dedicandose todavia a la costura y a la labranza de huerta particular.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana denuncia ejercicio militar EE.UU.-Japon-Sudcorea
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana denuncia ejercicio militar EE.UU.-Japon-Sudcorea
Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que Estados Unidos volvio a desarrollar junto con Japon y el Sur de Corea el entrenamiento militar conjunto contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 22 la siguiente respuesta:
					El dia 22, EE.UU., Japon y los titeres surcoreanos entablaron un adiestramiento militar conjunto maritimo de caracter provocativo, cuyo blanco principal es la RPDC, al movilizar el destructor Aegis y otros buques de guerra, ademas de los efectivos.
					
					El presente ejercicio deviene otra provocacion militar seria contra la RPDC y la manifestacion de su ambicion dominacionista encaminada a perturbar la paz y la estabilidad de la region.
					
					Recientemente, el pais norteamericano desplego junto con los titeres surcoreanos un ejercicio militar conjunto maritimo de gran envergadura movilizando inmensas propiedades estrategicas como el portaaviones nuclear "Ronald Reagan". Insatisfecho con esto, EE.UU. vuelve a armar alborotos de presion militar incorporando a Japon, exponiendo su naturaleza de autor que exacerba la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El ejercicio de alarma de misiles en junio pasado y la presente maniobra militar evidencian que la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-el Sur de Corea ya no es una "fantasma", sino un eslabon principal de la estrategia de EE.UU. de dominar a Asia.
					
					De hecho, EE.UU. habla abiertamente de que se profundiza la cooperacion tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-el Sur de Corea segun la meta de segunda etapa de la estrategia de reequilibrio de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					La realidad muestra una vez mas que fueron muy justas la linea y la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado de intensificar mas en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo el disuasivo nuclear de caracter autodefensivo.
					
					La RPDC frustrara rotundamente los desafios de toda indole de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas lacayunas tomando mas firmemente la espada nuclear de la independencia y la justicia y defendera mas fidedignamente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: Vicepresidentes del CC de PTC se reunen con participantes en VII Congreso de FGSC
articles.content:
Vicepresidentes del CC de PTC se reunen con participantes en VII Congreso de FGSC
Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- Los vicepresidentes del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea visitaron el dia 22 el alojamiento de los participantes en el VII Congreso de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.
					Ante todo, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, los funcionarios interesados, los cuadros directivos del Comite Central de la FGSC se encontraron con los participantes en el Congreso y felicitaron a los funcionarios y los miembros de la FGSC y los obreros quienes participan en el presente conclave.
					
					Les estimularon escuchando los relatos sobre los exitos alcanzados al registrar grandes saltos e innovaciones en todos los sectores de la construccion del socialismo poniendose en la delantera de la lucha por sostener la idea y la causa del partido bajo la bandera de dar prioridad al autofortalecimiento.
					
					Encomendaron a los participantes que sean triunfadores orgullosos en la sagrada lucha por hacer brillar la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un al glorificar eternamente las inmortales proezas revolucionarias de los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il realizadas para el desarrollo de la FGSC y cumplir cabalmente las tareas presentadas en el VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: Equipo coreano ocupa primer lugar en Copa Mundial Sub-17 (F) de la FIFA de 2016
articles.content:
Equipo coreano ocupa primer lugar en Copa Mundial Sub-17 (F) de la FIFA de 2016
Pyongyang, 22 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Copa Mundial Sub-17 (F) de la FIFA de 2016, efectuada en Jordania, termino con la victoria de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Tras ocupar el primer lugar en la llave C, el equipo coreano gano a la seleccion de Ghana y a la venezolana en el cuarto de final y la semifinal, respectivamente.
					
					El dia 22, tuvo lugar la final entre la RPDC y Japon que termino sin ningun gol.
					
					En la loteria de penaltis, el once coreano vencio al japones con el marcador de 5:4.
